ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 10; The Endless Line
ComicInfo.Summary:
Chapter 10: Bloom attacks Jason and the team at Task Force X's headquarters, searching for something that he needs to continue his work at Powers International to revive the corpse that is believed to be Bane. In a flashback to months before, when Two-Face, Amelia, and Delia begin their work on Task Force Z, they reach out to Amanda Waller to use the Thinker to implant memories into the mystery corpse to make him believe that he is Bane.
The Endless Line: Neal Adams discusses his viewpoint on using new ideas and exercising his imagination, while many of the characters whom he contributed his talents to line up to thank him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 16:22:13. [CVDB939082] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:38. [Issue ID 2419904]
